title: What are the multiple meanings behind the symbol and how can meditation on it improve our perception of ourselves?
first_phrase: This text explores the multiple meanings behind the symbol of Mercury, which is a guide to understanding the perceptive soul of man. It delves into various expressions such as unconsciousness, subconsciousness, and the anima mundi, which indicate the internal dynamics that create perceptions. It then goes on to describe the different types of individuals categorized based on their respiratory and muscular base.
